Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • Function
      • Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends Function
    A class that representing a polynomial function. Inherits from the Function abstract class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial​(double... args)
        Constructs a Polynomial object with the specified coefficients. The coefficients are provided as a variable number of arguments in decreasing order of exponents.
        Parameters:
        args - The coefficients of the polynomial in decreasing order of exponents

      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial​(ItemInPolynomial[] polynomial)
        Constructs a Polynomial object with the specified polynomial items.
        Parameters:
        polynomial - The array of ItemInPolynomial objects representing the polynomial items

        Parameters:
